content.c_answer2: Back to the Future The Musical is 2 hours and 40 minutes (incl. interval) For a 7:30PM performance, the show will finish at roughly 10:10PM. For a 2:30PM performance, the show will finish at roughly 5:10PM.
content.name: How long is Back to the Future The Musical and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is Back to the Future The Musical and when does it finish?
